amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, changes the title of the "John Ogonowski Farmer-to-Farmer Program" to the "Doug Bereuter and John Ogonowski Farmer-to-Farmer Program".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 108-591 to change the title of the "John Ogonowski Farmer-to-Farmer Program" to the "Doug Bereuter and John Ogonowski Farmer-to-Farmer Program.".

action.text: Hyde amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. Modification makes technical and conforming changes to the amendment.
On agreeing to the Hyde amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
